name: Orin Online PVP MMORPG
description:
Discord Server: https://discord.gg/xQHcz3PCTn

Orin Online is a free to play PVP 2D MMORPG created by a two developer team collaboration with a US and Singaporean. Orin Online delivers the game with beautiful 2D Open World Maps where players can engage in fast paced PvP, PvE, car race in the chaos dungeon with friends, ride dragons, have pets and solve team puzzles.  Also features Global Player Level Board and Auction and Trading System. 

Features:
*Open World PvP
* Ride Dragons, Boats and Horses with Pets
* Global Player Level Board
* Variety of Spells and Cosmetic Skins
* Car Racing with Friends in Chaos Dungeons
* PvE , Story Quest and Special Unlockables
* Crafting
* Intense boss fights ranging from casual fun to hardcore action!
* Trade or Sell your items with other Players in our Discord Auction and Trading System
* Absolutely NO pay-to-win mechanics with premium cosmetic only cash shop (uses sandbox payment gateway, no real currency or payment, only simulation)
